cssSelector.description: A CSS selector to narrow the content extraction to a specific element.

format.description: The format to return the page content in. Defaults to text.

tabId.description: The tab ID to get content from. Defaults to the active tab.

paths.description: List of file paths to get icons for.

ignorePaths.description: Optional paths to exclude from index (absolute, ~, or root-relative). Defaults to configured ignore_paths.

root.description: Index root path (absolute, ~, or workspace-relative). Defaults to configured watch_root.

ignorePaths.description: Optional paths to exclude from listing recursion (absolute, ~, or path-relative).

path.description: Directory path (absolute, ~, or workspace-relative). Defaults to configured watch_root.

ignorePaths.description: Optional paths to exclude from index (absolute, ~, or root-relative). Defaults to configured ignore_paths.

root.description: Index root path (absolute, ~, or workspace-relative). Defaults to configured watch_root.

ignorePaths.description: Optional paths to exclude from indexing/search (absolute, ~, or root-relative).

maxDepth.description: Optional maximum depth from root; omit to search all indexed descendants.

query.description: Supports text terms, quoted phrases, AND/OR/NOT, groups with () or <>, wildcard/path segments (*, ?, ** with slash-sensitive matching), filters ext:/type:/size:/file:/folder:/parent:/in:/infolder:/nosubfolders:, and macros audio:/video:/doc:/exe:.

folder.description: Optional nested folder under notes/, using forward slashes.

get.description: Subscribe to real-time server events via SSE.

post.description:
Looks up the extension and tool by ID, executes the tool with the provided
JSON input, and returns a standardised `{ ok, data }` / `{ ok, error }` envelope.

200.description: Tool execution result envelope with { ok, data }

post.description: Process a user command. Returns an SSE stream of part.updated, context, and done events.

200.description: Tool output from the extension's open tool
